document_data.mainbody:
Fillistrom Wunderkundoodle was a healer in Phlan in 1489 DR.
Fillistrom liked taking his time to do things but was a very competent healer.
Fillistrom was a healer with a shop in Phlan. He was consulted by Aleyd Burral of the Knights of the Black Fist about a rumored dracolich or ghost ships attack on a nearby village but found no definitive answers about the assailants.
